description: Creamy ricotta and earthy mushrooms make a rich filling for this simple puff pastry tart.
name: Mushroom, Thyme & Ricotta Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the ricotta mixture inside the border and spread evenly. Brush the border with milk and bake for 15 minutes, until golden. Scatter with rocket and serve.
